Rainy_Day_0: Heh, sorry if I smell like wet dog.
Rainy_Day_1: Rain is kind of peaceful, don't you think? I find it soothing.
Rainy_Day_2: I found this while I was out last night. [281 404 422]
Rainy_Day_3: Buhh... I could really use a nap right about now.
Rainy_Day_4: I hope the yard doesn't turn into a swamp.
Rainy_Day_5: It's coming down pretty hard out there. How about we just stay in for the day?#$e#I know a few things we could do...$4
Rainy_Day_6: Coffee sounds really good right about now, what do you think, @?
Rainy_Night_0: It's a little chilly out, huh? Wanna cuddle?$1
Rainy_Night_1: I just came from outside. That's kind of like taking a shower, right?#$e#It's like washing me and my clothes.$1
Rainy_Night_2: I guess... if I had some pants I might've gone outside today... but, nah.$3#$b#You prefer me like this anyways, don't you?$4
Rainy_Night_3: I hope %pet doesn't play in the mud too much.
Rainy_Night_4: It's really cloudy out. Makes it kinda gloomy, but it's good for me, anyway.
Rainy_Night_5: Are you cold, @? I'll keep you warm, if you'd like.
Rainy_Night_6: The rain makes it kind of spooky out, don't you think?
Indoor_Day_0: Need any help around the farm?#$e#Just let me know if you need anything.
Indoor_Day_2: I get along a lot better with my uncle now, but my mom...#$e#I'm just afraid of what she'd do if she found out about my condition...
Indoor_Day_3: Mm... I should probably get dressed, huh?
Indoor_Day_4: Hey, I don't say this a lot, but thanks for putting up with me.#$e#I love you, @.$4
Indoor_Day_5: I wish I could just lie in bed with you forever. You look so cute when you sleep.$6#$e#Don't know how you sleep through my snoring though.
Indoor_Night_0: Are you about done for the day, @? Don't overdo it, okay?
Indoor_Night_1: Wonder if I could get my old band back together?
Indoor_Night_2: Man, I'm pretty beat. What about you?
Indoor_Night_3: What do you wanna do for dinner? I can cook if you'd like.
Indoor_Night_4: Naturally, I'm more of a dog person. What about you, @?
Indoor_Night_5: The nice, warm bed is calling our names. Are you getting tired?
Indoor_Night_6: Hey, I'm glad you're home, @!#$e#No reason, I just wanted to see you.$4
Outdoor_0: It's really nice here. It sure beats living in the mountains far away from town.
Outdoor_1: Going to the mines today, @? I'd tell you to be careful, but I know you can handle yourself.
Outdoor_2: What's %pet up to, anyway? Not getting into trouble, I hope.
Outdoor_3: Your farm is in the perfect location. It's close to town, but still close to the forest.
Outdoor_4: You've put so much work into your farm, @. It really inspires me.
Outdoor_6: Do you like fishing, @? We should go fishing sometime.#$e#Maybe we could go camping.
OneKid_0: I hope %kid1 doesn't take after me.
OneKid_1: Does %kid1 have fleas? What? #$b#$9 No, I don't have fleas, why would you think that?
OneKid_3: Heh, I feel really old now that we have a kid.
OneKid_4: Before I met you, if you had told me I'd be married and have a kid right now I would have laughed my ass off.#$e#I'm glad that's changed.$l
TwoKids_0: I fed the kids. They can eat almost as much as me.
TwoKids_1: Ow! %kid2 just bit me!#$e#...You don't think that's a sign of things to come, do you?
TwoKids_2: Ugh... %kid2 is being a little brat today. Must've gotten that from me...
TwoKids_3: The kids are kind of a handfull...#$e#...But I wouldn't have it any other way.$h
TwoKids_4: We did good, @. I'm going to make sure these kids have the best life they can.$6
Good_0: You look beautiful today, @.$4#$e#I mean, you look beautiful every day, but y'know.
Good_1: You're beautiful, you know that?$4#$e#What? I just felt like saying it.
Good_2: I just realized that I never told mom that I got married.#$e#Oops.
Good_3: Do you think I should tell mom about... my condition? What do you think she'd say?
Good_4: Huh? You wanna know if I ever finished that song I was writing for you?#$e#Well, uh, it was too cheesy, so...$4
Good_5: This must be what they mean when they say you're living the dream.#$e#Cause sometimes I worry that this is all just a dream.
Good_6: While I was in highschool, the other kids said I was edgy.#$e#It's difficult to not be edgy when you've got moon sickness, y'know?
Good_8: What are you up to today, @? Lemme know if you need anything.
Good_9: *smooch* I could kiss you all day if you'd let me.$1
Neutral_0: Sorry, I feel kind of off today.
Neutral_2: Why don't you tell me about your day when we're in bed tonight? I'm kind of tired right now...
Neutral_3: Do you ever get tired of farmlife?
Neutral_4: Ugh, I don't feel like doing anything today.
Neutral_5: I'm just going to be by myself today, alright?#$e#You didn't do anything wrong...
Neutral_6: If you need to go see your friends in town, go ahead. I'll hold down the fort.
Neutral_8: Ugh... housework is such a chore. I guess that's why they call it chores, huh?
Bad_5: I just need some time alone, okay?#$e#Don't you have farm stuff to do?
Bad_6: What do you want? I don't feel like talking right now.$5
Bad_7: Farm-life is actually really boring. What am I doing here?$2
Bad_8: You nag a lot, you know that?$5
funLeave_Denver: Hey, I'm going to go out today, alright? Don't have too much fun while I'm gone.
funReturn_Denver: Today was pretty exhausting. Are you heading home? We could walk together.
spring_5: Do you have plans for this weekened? Wanna go out or something?
spring_1: Another year gone... but this one means more to me because I spent it with you.
spring_12: I used to be really good at the egg hunt. I'm too old now, though.
spring_23: Do you wanna go to the flower dance? I'm not much into dancing, but I will if you want to.
spring_27: I don't mind summer, but it gets hot with all that fur, y'know?
summer_1: There are too many bugs this time of year. I bet the ones in the mines are going crazy.
summer_5: The beach isn't really my thing but this heat is killing me... wanna head over later?#$e#And seeing you in a swimsuit is always a plus.$4
summer_8: Heh, you look really good in that outfit, @.
summer_10: The luau is my favorite, cause I can eat all I want.
summer_19: Summer is almost over, which means my favorite season is almost here.
summer_27: We're going to see the jellies tomorrow, right? They're really magical.
fall_1: Pumpkin spice coffee, pumpkin spice cookies, pumpkin spice... you get the point.
fall_4: Pff... you got a leaf stuck in your hair.$1#$e#Here let me get it for you.
fall_15: Are you building a display tomorrow? Good luck.
fall_17: I'm pretty sure you look better every day.
fall_23: It's getting pretty cold. Are we ready for winter?
fall_26: What are we doing tomorrow?#$e# We should have a costume party, since I've already got the best costume.
winter_1: Any big plans this winter? You don't have any crops to worry about so maybe we both could just hibernate.$1
winter_5: It's freezing today. Are you cold?#$e#Don't lie! You should see how red your cheeks are!$1#$b#Stay out much longer and you might become a popsicle.$6
winter_8: We should start a snowball fight at the festival tomorrow. That'd shake things up a bit.
winter_13: Uncle Marlon wants me to go on a hike with him.#$e#His leg slows him down a bit, but I don't mind.
winter_16: It's freezing today. Are you cold?#$e#Don't lie! You should see how red your cheeks are!$1#$b#Stay out much longer and you might become a popsicle.$6
winter_25: Despite everything, I think I'm most thankful for you.$4
winter_28: Well, another year gone by... I can't believe you've stayed with me for this long.$6#$e#I hope you continue to.$4
